def_cn: （与名词和形容词连用构成形容词）表示“在…受教育的”，“在…读书的”
def_en: -educated combines with nouns and adjectives to form adjectives indicating where someone was educated.

def_cn: （与副词连用构成形容词）表示“受过…教育的”
def_en: -educated combines with adverbs to form adjectives indicating how much education someone has had and how good it was.
